summary: An Ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, extending and establishing of a Public Alley, between Pasadena Place and 7th Avenue Northeast, from East 40th Street to East 42nd Street; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary for the laying off, opening, extending and establishing of the above described alley; and for the establishing of the grades and for the grading of the above described alley in conformity with the grades established herein; providing for the necessary slopes for cuts and fills upon the property abutting upon said alley; and providing that the entire cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law.
